comments:
We've seen this happen running CVS operations in the background a couple of 
times. Of course, it's not reproduceable but happens enough.

I released some code today to fix some existing concurrency bugs in the
ElementTree.  Please let me know if you see this or other assertion failures in
the ElementTree in your nightly tests after tonight.
